title: Can I run league?
body:
My specs are: 

i3-3217U
4 GB RAM
intel HD graphics 4000
energy option already on high perfomance
intel control panel already on maximum perfomance

I should be able to play i thin, but im getting barely 25 fps  is it normal or? 

PLS answer

replies.body:
A dedicated GPU can't hurt, that's for sure, but from the specs here I'd say you're in the clear compared to our [**minimum and recommended specs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements#wq1).

If you're still having FPS trouble it could indicate that your drivers are out of date perhaps. Let's make sure that yours are up to date to start with the steps in [**this guide here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1). Try those steps and open a Custom Game to test the results. Let me know if it helped!
I suggest a dedicated GPU.  Even an older one would remedy your situation greatly.
